Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.menu

Menu and menu related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdapterMenuItem Allows any widget to be placed in a menu.
CheckMenuItem Adds a menu item that contains a checkbox by default, but can also be part of a radio group.
ColorMenu  
DateMenu A Menu for choosing a date.
HeaderMenuItem A menu item for headings.
Item The base class for all items that render into menus.
Menu A menu component.
MenuBar A horizontal menu bar.
MenuBarItem Child of MenuBar.
MenuItem A base class for all menu items that require menu-related functionality (like sub-menus) and are not static display items.
SeparatorMenuItem Adds a separator bar to a menu, used to divide logical groups of menu items.
 

Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.menu Description

Menu and menu related classes.
